documents.document:
FRIEND

What a FRIEND is –
A tissue when you can’t stop crying.
A shoulder when you feel like dying.
Always listens when have something to say.
A week when you need just a day.
A crutch you have a broken heart.
A sun when rain just won’t stop.
A phone call when you can’t leave the home.
A hand when you feel all alone.
A wing if you want to fly. Understands without knowing why.
An ear for secret to fall.
An aspirin when your head hurts like hell.
A FRIEND is a true love that can never let go.
A FRIEND is you & I wanted you to know
plz accept me 4 a sweetest frnd ship 4ever plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz?????????

friendship

LIFE is LIE when "F" is missing...

that F = """""FRIENDSHIP""""""

request

If i say hi.......u may say whoz this....
if i ask for chat....u may say why??....
if i ask u for a coffee.....u may say wt rubbish....
if i say i liked ur profile......u may say m flattering u.....
if i ask for frnship.......u may say m flirting......

so can u plz suggest me hw to start wid a new relation.........????
m here looking for friends i like u, .....…"….........".....

love

You look so fine! I want to...
break your heart and give you mine
You are like the sunshine so warm,
you are like sugar, so sweet...
you are like you...
and that's the reason why I love you!

friend request

i like make a friendship.......
because friendship is the best way by which we can exchange our thoughts..........
and also share our thoughts.................
soooooo, please add me as a friend..........

best

The best teacher is your heart................
The best healer is time,................
The best judge is your conscious..............
Your best friend could only be GOD ....................
Your CUTEST FRIEND can only be ME...............

about me

I would love to know you better ....
A little about me... I'm beautiful and I'm here to look for a God friends Talking about who i am, I am that easy going type,open minded and a good listener .I laugh a lot and try to make people around me all the time happy.My hobbies are a lot more but to mention few; sports,watching movies, going for walks, playing with kids, listening to all types of music), dancing in the dark etc. My favorite movies are romantic movies,suspense,drama,comedy and Adventure,my eating habits: I eat NV alot..Just about anything.My ---------is one of my most attractive features.,

can we be friends....

can we be friends....

I Believe In !

I Believe In !

1. I believe that life is there to enjoy.
2. I believe crushes are there to crush hearts.
3. I believe true love is there from the start.
4. I believe you should give people chances.
5. I believe you should treat people the same because you never know what they will do for you in the future.
6. I believe that good things will come to people who work hard.
7. I believe great things come to people who never give up.
8. I believe silence will teach you something if you listen hard.
9. I believe that the heart leads you in the right direction if you follow it.
10. I believe friends are needed no matter who you are.
11. I believe family should stick by your side.
12. I believe God will help you if you believe in him and trust him.
13. I believe drugs destroy.
14. I believe sleep calms the soul.
15. I believe the heart and soul are more important than looks.
16. I believe trust helps the world go round.
17. I believe love brings great things.
18. I believe kids could teach adults a lot if adults would just listen.
19.I believe pets are great because they listen and love you no matter what you look like.
20. I believe you should always chase your dreams.
21. I believe hope is something everyone needs.
22. I believe you need to make time for fun.
23. I believe music soothes the soul.
24. I believe that money cannot buy happiness.
25. I believe books can take you anywhere.
26. I believe jokes have to be there to keep people sane.
27. I believe people are special the way they are.
28. I believe that true friends will last a lifetime.
29. I believe that enjoying what you do will help you enjoy life more.
30. I believe parents are more important than you think.
31. I believe the sky is the limit.
32. I believe you should shoot for the stars.
33. I believe being loved and loving are two totally different things.
34. I believe that you have to love yourself before you can love others.
35. I believe records are made to be broken.
36. I believe promises should be kept.
37. I believe brothers and sisters are made to teach.
38. I believe a simple smile can make anybody's day better.
39. I believe that being popular is not the key to life.
40. I believe in being nice to nerds because you might grow up and have to work for one.

Life

Life ends when u stop Dreaming; ..........
Hope ends when u stop Believing;.........
Love ends when u stop Caring;...............

So Dream, Believe n Care, Life is really Beautiful.

joke

Wife and Husband prepare to go to bed.

Wife starts to sing the national anthem: "God Save The Queen".

Husband asks: Why are you singing the National Anthem during bedtime?

Wife replies: when the people sing the anthem, they stand up, so I'm hoping something will stand up!"

good friend

Its not an achievement to make 1000 friends in a year............
but an achievement is when you make a friend for 1000 years.........

Good morning!!!....

Morning Time-

A cup of hot hello,
A plate of crispy wishes,
a spoon of sweet smiles & a slice of great success specially for u...
Enjoy the day!!!
Good morning!!!....

FRIEND and BLOOD

Friend and Blood have only one Difference :--

Blood Enters in Heart and Flow Out...........
But Friend Enters in Heart and Stay Inside Forever..........

[photothumb]11944678[/photothumb]

Make good friends and ENJOY the life.........

Send me a FRIEND request if u have time to chat with me..........
